member.name: T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkAddressChangedEventHandler
member.summary: References one or more methods to be called when the address of a network interface changes.
member.param: An object that contains data about the event.

member.name: T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange
member.summary: Allows applications to receive notification when the Internet Protocol (IP) address of a network interface, also called a network card or adapter, changes.

member.name: E:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the IP address of a network interface changes.

member.name: T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface
member.summary: Provides configuration and statistical information for a network interface.

member.name: M:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetIsNetworkAvailable
member.summary: Indicates whether any network connection is available.
member.returns: true if a network connection is available; otherwise, false.
